title: Christ Who Welcomed Little Children
lyrics:
Christ who welcomed little children,
To Thine arms in Galilee,
Lovingly we bring this baby,
That He too be blessed by Thee.

Lord, accept the parents' praises,
Help them by Thy grace divine,
May their tender care and nurture,
Train and lead him to be Thine.

In their home may Thine own presence,
Guide and guard from day to day,
Filling life with love and gladness
Throughout all His childhood's way.

Then in strength of mind and body,
May he own The Lord and King,
Tread the paths Of Christian service
All His heart's allegiance bring.

Christ who welcomes little children,
Bid this baby welcome too,
May Thy mighty arms protect him,
All life's varied journey through.
